content: Not able to find Spark.MonogoStore nuget. Trying to setup Spark as Service

You can find Spark.Mongo here: https://www.nuget.org/packages/Spark.Mongo/0.90.8-beta1. Note that it is a prerelease, so you'll have to check the 'include prerelease' box if you're using the NuGet package manager to search for it.
